plot: An businessman leaves his hotel in Rio after paying off a hooker and gets in the first cab he sees. That is the beginning of the end for him.
title: Tudo Cheira a Gasolina
plot_es: An businessman leaves his hotel in Rio after paying off a hooker and gets in the first cab he sees. That is the beginning of the end for him.
plot_en: An businessman leaves his hotel in Rio after paying off a hooker and gets in the first cab he sees. That is the beginning of the end for him.
